verbs.description: [ARG0: astronaut mark] kelly [V: says] [ARG1: trump order to create a space force] is a dumb idea president donald trump on monday said he wanted to create a sixth military division called the space force but mark kelly a retired nasa astronaut and navy veteran tweeted that it was a dumb idea because the us air force already has a space command and a space force national space council mark kelly trump space space force air force space command donald trump space mission force united states congress air force space command united states department of defense
